infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a kitchen.

 You see a fridge.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The fridge contains [a list of things in the c_0]. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] What a letdown! The fridge is empty![end if] You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto an oven.[if oven_0 is open and there is something in the oven_0] The oven contains [a list of things in the oven_0]. Classic TextWorld.[end if][if oven_0 is open and the oven_0 contains nothing] The oven is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can see a table. [if there is something on the s_0]On the table you see [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But the thing is empty.[end if] You make out a counter. [if there is something on the s_1]On the counter you make out [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if] You make out a stove. The stove is conventional.[if there is something on the stove_0] On the stove you can make out [a list of things on the stove_0]. Classic TextWorld.[end if][if there is nothing on the stove_0] The stove appears to be empty.[end if]

infos.name: fridge
infos.desc: The [noun] looks well-built. [if open]It is open.[else if locked]It is locked.[otherwise]It is closed.[end if]

infos.name: red tuna
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that [noun].

infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that [noun].

infos.name: red apple
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that [noun].

infos.name: cookbook
infos.desc:
You open the copy of 'Cooking: A Modern Approach (3rd Ed.)' and start reading:

Recipe #1
---------
Gather all following ingredients and follow the directions to prepare this tasty meal.

Ingredients:
  red onion
  red potato
  white tuna

Directions:
  slice the red onion
  fry the red onion
  roast the red potato
  roast the white tuna
  prepare meal

objective: You are hungry! Let's cook a delicious meal. Check the cookbook in the kitchen for the recipe. Once done, enjoy your meal!
